name: rapacity
content:

the quality of having or showing a strong wish to take things for yourself, usually using unfair methods or force: the rapacity of big corporations Our rapacity is destroying species at a rate not seen in 65 million years. See
rapacious
More examplesFewer examplesHe carried out his job with the careful rapacity of a born moneylender.She talked angrily about the rapacity with which we have ransacked the earth's resources.He fought against the rapacity of merchants.
